name: AI Up My Duck
description:
FULL RELEASE ON 6TH JUNE 2022

AI Up My Duck is a visual novel game inspired by Lina Bo Bardi and her idea of play. This story is about how Lee Vitaht chose to participate in a game with the prize of immortality on the line, however immortality isn't what it always seems and death might just be a mercy. 

This is a interactive game with mini games and mature themes however this is still a fun experience for young ones. The game is available on Itch.io and available between June and July at Nottingham Contemporary Weekday Cross, Nottingham, England NG1 2GB.
